title: Stumart
description: Marketplace to sell used items with CRUD APIs, auth, AI descriptions, search, pagination, and AI-powered filters. Responsive frontend with Next.js and TailwindCSS.

title: Cryptoverse
description: Responsive app for real-time cryptocurrency analysis and tracking with Context API, CoinGecko and Bing News, and interactive Chart.js visualizations.

title: RealState
description: Real estate marketplace with data-driven listings, advanced sorting and filtering by location, property type, and more.
